title: Monthly Evaluation Results Announced
description: The latest monthly evaluation, airing now, showcases impressive improvements from all trainees in vocal, dance, and performance skills on *Boys II Planet*.

title: URGENT: IST Clarification on Sihwan + Debut Date Tease
description: IST Entertainment clarifies Kim Si Hwan’s past drama with an apology resolution, confirming his spot. Debut date hinted for this week—stay tuned!
